abstract: The giant student lender is suing the firms that agreed to buy it, but are now trying to renegotiate the deal.
snippet: The giant student lender is suing the firms that agreed to buy it, but are now trying to renegotiate the deal.
lead_paragraph: The SLM Corporation, parent of the student lender Sallie Mae, filed a lawsuit yesterday against a group of firms that had agreed to buy it for $25 billion but now are trying to renegotiate the deal.

headline.main: Sallie Mae Sues to Force a Buyout
headline.print_headline: Sallie Mae Sues to Force A Buyout

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la Merced
